body.p: Born in New York in 1822 in Busti, New York. He attended Jamestown Academy in Jamestown, NY. Appointed to West Point Military Academy in 1842. Graduated from West Point in 1846 with high honors. Served in Mexican War. In command of the San Francisco Presidio in 1848 and 1849. Served in the Civil War and rose to the rank of Colonel. United Sates Army Cavalry officer. Adjutant to George B. McClellan. Died in September 1894.
